name: VERY GOOD CHICKEN
instructions: Flatten chicken between wax paper. Spread with ½ of the butter
Season with salt and pepper, Place 1 slice of cheese on each chicken breast
Roll up and fasten ends with toothpicks
Coat lightly with flour, dip in egg and roll in bread crumbs
Bake at 350 for 30 minutes with butter mixture, basting occasionally.
Pour wine over chicken and bake additional 20 minutes, continue basting.
